languages.text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость. Резиденция губернатора Урбенда находится на другой стороне мира — у административного дворца Даргонуса. Мы отправили извещение в губернаторские чертоги сразу, как вы прибыли в систему. Однако требуется время, чтобы преодолеть немалые расстояния ваших владений".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость. Резиденция губернатора Урбенда находится на другой стороне мира — у административного дворца Даргонуса. Мы отправили извещение в губернаторские чертоги сразу, как вы прибыли в систему. Однако требуется время, чтобы преодолеть немалые расстояния ваших владений".

languages.text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administratum Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."
languages.original_text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость. Резиденция губернатора Урбенда находится на другой стороне мира — у административного дворца Даргонуса. Мы отправили извещение в губернаторские чертоги сразу, как вы прибыли в систему. Однако требуется время, чтобы преодолеть немалые расстояния ваших владений".

traits.locale_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Urbend's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administrative Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Urbend's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administrative Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administrative Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administrative Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administrative Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

languages.text: “抱歉，大人。德莱夫斯塔总督的住处位于这个世界的另一端，在达戈努斯内政部宫殿旁。您一来到这个星系，我们就发出了消息通知他，但在您的领地内长途跋涉恐怕要花些时间。”
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administratum Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

traits.locale_text: “抱歉，大人。德莱夫斯塔总督的住处位于这个世界的另一端，在达戈努斯行政宫殿旁边。您一来到这个星系，我们就发出了消息通知他，但在您的领地内长途跋涉，也是需要一定时间的。”

languages.text: «Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La residencia del gobernador Drivestem está al otro lado del planeta, junto al palacio del Administratum en Dargonus. Le hemos informado en cuanto llegó al sistema, pero para recorrer las grandes extensiones de sus dominios sigue haciendo falta algo de tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administratum Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La residencia del gobernador Drivestem está al otro lado del planeta, junto al palacio del Administratum en Dargonus. Le hemos informado en cuanto llegó al sistema, pero para recorrer las grandes extensiones de sus dominios sigue haciendo falta algo de tiempo».

languages.text: 「お許しください、陛下。ドライブステム総督のお住まいはこの惑星の反対側、ダルゴナスの行政宮殿の側にございます。あなたが星系に入ってからすぐに知らせたのですが、領域を移動するには時間がかかってしまうのです」
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administratum Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

traits.locale_text: 「お許しください、陛下。ドライブステム総督のお住まいはこの惑星の反対側、ダルゴナスの行政宮殿の側にございます。あなたが星系に入ってからすぐに知らせたのですが、領域を移動するには時間がかかってしまうのです」

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Gouverneur Drivestem wohnt auf der anderen Seite der Welt – im Administratum-Palast von Dargonus. Wir haben ihn verständigt, sobald Ihr ins System eingeflogen wart. Aber es erfordert Zeit, die großen Entfernungen Eures Gebiets zu überwinden."
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administratum Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Gouverneur Drivestem wohnt auf der anderen Seite der Welt – im Verwaltungspalast von Dargonus. Wir haben ihn verständigt, sobald Ihr ins System eingeflogen wart. Aber es erfordert Zeit, die großen Entfernungen Eures Gebiets zu überwinden."

languages.text: « Toutes nos excuses, Votre Seigneurie. La résidence du gouverneur Drivestem se situe de l'autre côté de ce monde, près du palais de l'Administratum de Dargonus. Nous l'avons bien entendu informé de votre arrivée dès que vous avez franchi les frontières du système, mais votre domaine est très étendu, et couvrir une telle distance prend du temps. »
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administratum Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes nos excuses, Votre Seigneurie. La résidence du gouverneur Drivestem se situe de l'autre côté de ce monde, près du palais de l'Administratum de Dargonus. Nous l'avons bien entendu informé de votre arrivée dès que vous avez franchi les frontières du système, mais votre domaine est très étendu, et couvrir une telle distance prend du temps. »

languages.text: "Özürlerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Vali Drivestem'in konutu gezegenin diğer tarafında, Dargonus Administratum Sarayı'nın yakınlarında. Sisteme girdiğinizi duyar duymaz haber yolladık ancak engin diyarınızda seyahat etmek zaman alabilmekte."
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Governor Drivestem's residence is on the other side of the world — by the Administratum Palace of Dargonus. We sent word as soon as you entered the system. But it takes time to travel the great distances of your domain."

traits.locale_text: "Özürlerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Vali Drivestem'in konutu gezegenin diğer tarafında, Dargonus Administratum Sarayı'nın yakınlarında. Sisteme girdiğinizi duyar duymaz haber yolladık ancak engin diyarınızda seyahat etmek zaman alabilmekte."
